meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>alliance</kanji> <kanji>promise</kanji> is one that's made with a <vocabulary>pledge</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>pact</vocabulary>. Imagine making an alliance with someone, pledging your support.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
